documentation.text:
·
 @title EthRandom - Get a verifiable random number with Chainlink VRF
 Docs: https://docs.chain.link/docs/get-a-random-number/
 Contract Address & Fee: https://docs.chain.link/docs/vrf-contracts/
 Polygon: https://blog.chain.link/how-to-get-a-random-number-on-polygon/
 Remark: After the contract is deployed, it must be ensured that there are more
 than 5 random numbers in the random number pool
 Version v1.0.0
